column1: # The following readings are estimates and have been omitted:
# - all months in 1947 except October and November
# - all months in 1950 except May, June and July
# - all months in 1951 except May, September, October and November
# - all months in 1952 except March and April
# - all months in 1953 except February, March, April and December
# The church and railway station directions put the site about 500m north east of Rowley Rectory itself. (The rectory grid reference is SE975325.)
